author: oheger
msg: Extended BasicBuilderProperties by a ConfigurationDecoder property.
It is now possible to set the decoder property via initialization parameters of

author: oheger
msg: Implemented getEncodedString() using a default decoder.
A property for the default decoder was added to AbstractConfiguration.

author: oheger
msg: Implemented getEncodedString() which expects a ConfigurationDecoder.

author: tn
msg: [FILEUPLOAD-252] Do not lose IO exception when closing the stream.

author: oheger
msg: Added methods for querying encoded strings to ImmutableConfiguration.
With these methods it is possible to query the values of configuration
properties stored in encoded form. Before they are handed to the calling
application, the values are passed to a ConfigurationDecoder.
